mapper.sql: CEIL(COUNT(1) / #{paging.limit}) AS PAGE_CNT , COUNT(1) AS LIST_CNT , #{paging.limit} AS 'LIMIT' , #{paging.offset} AS 'OFFSET'
mapper.select: SELECT CEIL(LIST_CNT/ #{limit}) AS PAGE_CNT , LIST_CNT , #{limit} AS 'LIMIT' , #{offset} AS 'OFFSET' FROM( SELECT FOUND_ROWS() AS LIST_CNT ) AS PAGING
